about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack from Spacejacked by Sawsquarenoise!

Enjoy the chiptune goodness from the retro-infused, super-fast-paced indie game, Spacejacked! This absolutely FREE and meaty soundtrack contains 17 tracks, including a couple that's not even in the game itself (yet)!

01 - Tutorial 04:41
02 - Splash 03:29
03 - Ship 03:09
04 - Ship under attack 03:09
05 - Go Go Go 03:28
06 - Go Go Faster Faster 03:30
07 - Let's Rest 03:09
08 - Rescued 01:19
09 - Metallius 01:36
10 - Go Go Metallius 01:49
11 - Where am I 02:32
12 - Wherever Aliens 03:23
13 - More Aliens 02:22
14 - Calm Time 00:48
15 - Super Super 01:15
16 - Jingle 01 00:07
17 - Jingle 02 00:14
